mapper.select: SELECT REV_NO,ITEM,IMG,WRITER,AGE,SKIN,GENDER,GOOD,BAD,TIP,POP,STAR,REVIEW.NALJA FROM REVIEW INNER JOIN MEMBERS ON REVIEW.WRITER=MEMBERS.NICK WHERE ITEM=#{item} AND OPEN=1 ORDER BY REV_NO LIMIT 10;

SELECT REV_NO,ITEM,IMG,WRITER,AGE,SKIN,GENDER,GOOD,BAD,TIP,POP,STAR,REVIEW.NALJA FROM REVIEW INNER JOIN MEMBERS ON REVIEW.WRITER=MEMBERS.NICK WHERE ITEM=#{item} AND OPEN=1 ORDER BY REV_NO LIMIT #{review_num},5;
SELECT REV_NO,ITEM,IMG,WRITER,AGE,SKIN,GENDER,GOOD,BAD,TIP,POP,STAR,REVIEW.NALJA FROM REVIEW INNER JOIN MEMBERS ON REVIEW.WRITER=MEMBERS.NICK WHERE ITEM=#{item} AND REV_NO=#{rev_no} AND OPEN=1
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET IMG=#{img}, GOOD=#{good},BAD=#{bad},TIP=#{tip},STAR=#{star},POP=#{pop} WHERE ITEM=#{item} AND REV_NO=#{rev_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REVIEW WHERE ITEM=#{item} AND REV_NO=#{rev_no}
